quote: Death is not the opposite of life, but a part of it.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.
author: Anais Nin

quote:
For life and death are one,
 even as the river and the sea are one.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote:
No one is actually dead until the ripples
 they cause in the world die away.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: As soon as you’ll realize it was a gift, you’ll be free.
author: Maxime Lagace

quote:
A normal human being does not want the Kingdom of Heaven: 
 he wants life on earth to continue.
author: George Orwell

quote:
Death commences too early
 – almost before you’re half-acquainted
 with life – you meet the other
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Neither fire nor wind, birth nor death can erase our good deeds.
author: Buddha

quote:
Everyone dies eventually,
 whether they have power or not.
  That’s why you need to think about
 what you’ll accomplish while you’re alive.
author: Mary Macbeth

quote:
Death never takes the wise man by surprise,
 he is always ready to go.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote:
Death is like a mirror in which the true meaning
 of life is reflected.
author: Sogyal Rinpoche

quote: Death is nothing, but to live defeated is to die every day.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote:
The fear of death follows from the fear of life.
 A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
author: Mark Twain

quote:
Death is no more than passing from one room into another.
 But there's a difference for me, you know.
 Because in that other room I shall be able to see.
author: Helen Keller

quote:
While I thought that I was learning how to live,
 I have been learning how to die.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote:
I do not fear death.
 I had been dead for billions and billions of years
 before I was born, and had not suffered
 the slightest inconvenience from it.
author: Mark Twain

quote:
Things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end,
 if not always in the way we expect.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: Don’t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
author: Rumi

quote:
Each night, when I go to sleep, I die.
 And the next morning, when I wake up, I am reborn.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote:
As a man, casting off worn out garments taketh new ones,
 so the dweller in the body, entereth into ones that are new.
author: Epictetus

quote:
This life is but a brief tenure,
 one of many perspectives a spirit must experience
 in the quest for eternity.
author: Brian Rathbone

quote:
Do your thoughts continue and repeat a cycle.
 Seed, growth, bloom, and seed again
author: Richard L. Ratliff

quote: To live in hearts we leave behind is not to die.
author: Thomas Campbell

quote: He is terribly afraid of dying because he hasn’t yet lived.
author: Franz Kafka

quote:
Do not seek death. But do not fear it either.
 There cannot be life without death, it is inescapable.
author: Keisei Tagami

quote:
It is the unknown we fear
 when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote:
I regret not death.
 I am going to meet my friends in another world.
author: Ludovico Ariosto
Zhuangzi

quote: There is no death. Only a change of worlds.
author: Chief Seattle

quote:
From my rotting body, flowers shall grow
 and I am in them and that is eternity.
author: Thomas Moore

quote:
Endings are not always bad.
 Most times they’re just beginnings in disguise.
author: Kim Harrison

quote: Death – the last sleep? No, it is the final awakening.
author: Walter Scott

quote:
Of course you don’t die. Nobody dies. Death doesn’t exist.
 You only reach a new level of vision,
 a new realm of consciousness, a new unknown world.
author: Henry Miller
